text: Group F of the 2018 FIFA World Cup took place from 17 to 27 June 2018. The group consisted of Germany, Mexico, Sweden, and South Korea. The top two teams advanced to the round of 16. ==Teams== Draw position Team Pot Confederation Method of qualification Date of qualification Finals appearance Last appearance Previous best performance UEFA Second Round winners 13 November 2017 12th 2006 Runners-up (1958) 25 F4 4 AFC AFC Third Round Group A runners-up 5 September 2017 10th 2014 Fourth place (2002) 62 ;Notes ==Standings== In the round of 16: * The winners of Group F will advance to play the runners-up of Group E. * The runners-up of Group F will advance to play the winners of Group E. ==Matches== All times listed are local
